abort.already_configured: This Oura account is already configured.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Oura
reauth_confirm.description: The Oura integration needs to re-authenticate your account.

application_credentials.description: Create an OAuth2 app in the [Oura developer console]({console_url}) and enter the credentials below. Set the redirect URI to {oauth_redirect_url}.
